text: Benin competed at the 2019 World Aquatics Championships in Gwangju, South Korea from 12 to 28 July. ==Swimming== Benin entered three swimmers. ;Men {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; font-size:90%" |- !rowspan="2"|Athlete !rowspan="2"|Event !colspan="2"|Heat !colspan="2"|Semifinal !colspan="2"|Final |-style="font-size:95%" !Time !Rank !Time !Rank !Time !Rank |- |align=left rowspan=2|Gildas Koumondji |align=left|50 m breaststroke |34.90 |71 |colspan=4|Did not advance |- |align=left|100 m breaststroke |1:26.57 |87 |colspan=4|Did not advance |- |align=left rowspan=2|Jefferson Kpanou |align=left|50 m freestyle |26.18 |111 |colspan=4|Did not advance |- |align=left|50 m butterfly |28.72 |80 |colspan=4|Did not advance |} ;Women {| class="wikitable" style="text- align:center; font-size:90%" |- !rowspan="2"|Athlete !rowspan="2"|Event !colspan="2"|Heat !colspan="2"|Semifinal !colspan="2"|Final |-style="font- size:95%" !Time !Rank !Time !Rank !Time !Rank |- |align=left rowspan=2|Nafissath Radji |align=left|50 m freestyle |30.85 |85 |colspan=4|Did not advance |- |align=left|50 m backstroke |36.01 |45 |colspan=4|Did not advance |} ==References== Category:Nations at the 2019 World Aquatics Championships Category:Benin at the World Aquatics Championships World Aquatics Championships
title: Benin at the 2019 World Aquatics Championships
